name: The End of Winter (Team_GYLLY)
description:
Winter, a joyous 7-year-old girl who fantasises about spending her wintry days creating an adorable snowman. Over multiple chapters, she must gather, construct, and give life to her creation. While her parents' relationship deteriorates, she thinks lovingly about the ideal snow-buddy and anticipates each passing day. Will the winter's end only bring suffering, or will there be a breath of fresh air before the seasons change?

~STILL IN DEVELOPMENT~
